summary: This release brings Grove's visual identity to life with beautiful new logos and icons, while making everything more stable under the hood. You'll find a redesigned header, smarter workshop navigation, and important fixes for a smoother experience. We've also added automated release summaries and completed a major code audit, paving a solid path toward our 1.0 launch.

features: add LogoSanctuary showcase to Vineyard page (#294)
redesign header with unified Grove chrome (#292)
add LogoSanctuary component from uploaded image (#293)
add 8 new Grove logo concepts for review (#272)
update workshop icons for improved visual organization
update workshop icons - breeze to send-to-back, patterns to regex
add backfill option to auto-tag workflow
update launch announcement to celebrate paperwork completion
add manual workflow to backfill historical release summaries
integrate AI release summaries into milestones timeline
fixes: skip type check for vineyard re-exports
resolve all 165 TypeScript type errors for CI
remove references to non-existent font components
resolve TypeScript type errors for deployment
resolve TypeScript errors in auth and inference modules
resolve deployment TypeScript errors across plant and engine
comprehensive test suite fixes for landing package
update OG forest tests for redirect proxy behavior
